used to describe a house, etc. that is designed and built by a person or company to be sold to anyone who will buy it, rather than for a particular customer: spec home Building high-priced spec homes is a gamble that can pay off but also can prove disastrous when the market tightens.spec house His company has one spec house for sale in Scottsdale for nearly $3.8 million.
